title: Jean-Marie Chevalier - The New Energy Crisis. Climate, Economics
description:
Description
Product Details
Book Title: The New Energy Crisis: Climate, Economics and Geopolitics	
Book Author: Jean-Marie Chevalier (Editor)
Hardcover: 272 pages
Publisher: Palgrave Macmillan (July 7, 2009)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 0230577393
ISBN-13: 978-0230577398

===================================================================================
Book Description
The New Energy Crisis comes from the recent intrusion of climate change issues into energy economics and geopolitics. Global warming suddenly reveals that the current evolution of the world energy consumption is on an unsustainable path. This book explores economic and geopolitical tensions and reinforces ways to overcome the crisis.

===================================================================================
About the Author
JEAN-MARIE CHEVALIER is professor of economics at Univerisit Paris Dauphine, Director of the Centre de Gopolitique de l'Energie et des Matires Premires (CGEMP), France. He is also Senior Associate at Cambridge Energy Research Associates (CERA). He has also published numerous books and articles on energy and industrial organization.
===================================================================================
